ModMetaData.name: Bloody Mess (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Uuugggg https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3009064063 It has been reported that the original author has passed away; in their honor I present this continuation to the community. Requiescat in pace, Uuugggg.
--
I've fixed some bugs and added some additional null-checking.
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
By some strange twist of fate, people around you die violently. You always see the worst way a person can die.
Aye so it's a random trait, and whenever they kill someone it's really bloody.
